Description:
I am an aspiring AI/ML Engineer with hands-on experience in building and deploying real-world machine learning and deep learning solutions. I have a strong foundation in Python, C++, Data Structures Algorithms, and core computer science subjects, along with practical expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Data Science.
I have worked on impactful projects including multimodal deepfake detection systems, customer segmentation using clustering, AI-powered healthcare solutions, real-time route planning using graph algorithms, and multi-agent AI systems for retail optimization. My technical stack includes TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, FastAPI, Flask, Django, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
I am highly motivated to secure a high-paying internship and full-time role at top product-based companies, continuously improving my skills in DSA, ML/DL, and emerging technologies like LLMs. I believe in disciplined growth, real-world problem solving, and building solutions that create measurable impact.
